mapper.insert: insert into station (StationCode, StationName, DepartmentCode, StationDesc, DutyDesc, Relation1, Relation2, Station1, Station2, Xueli, Zhiyezige, Peixun, Gongzuojingyan, Gexingtezheng, Jibenjineng, OrderId, FullDepartmentCode,isEF) values (#{stationcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stationname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departmentcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stationdesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dutydesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{relation1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{relation2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{station1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{station2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xueli,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zhiyezige,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{peixun,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gongzuojingyan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gexingtezheng,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jibenjineng,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fulldepartmentcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{isEF,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into station
StationCode,
StationName,
DepartmentCode,
StationDesc,
DutyDesc,
Relation1,
Relation2,
Station1,
Station2,
Xueli,
Zhiyezige,
Peixun,
Gongzuojingyan,
Gexingtezheng,
Jibenjineng,
OrderId,
FullDepartmentCode,
isEF,

mapper.update: update station set StationName=#{stationname}, DepartmentCode=#{departmentcode}, StationDesc=#{stationdesc}, DutyDesc=#{dutydesc}, Relation1=#{relation1}, Relation2=#{relation2}, Station1=#{station1}, Station2=#{station2}, Xueli=#{xueli}, Zhiyezige=#{zhiyezige}, Peixun=#{peixun}, Gongzuojingyan=#{gongzuojingyan}, Gexingtezheng=#{ gexingtezheng}, Jibenjineng=#{jibenjineng}, OrderId=#{orderid},isEF=#{isEF} where StationCode=#{stationcode}

update station
StationName = #{stationname},
DepartmentCode = #{departmentcode},
StationDesc = #{stationdesc},
DutyDesc = #{dutydesc},
Relation1 = #{relation1},
Relation2 = #{relation2},
Station1 = #{station1},
Station2 = #{station2},
Xueli = #{xueli},
Zhiyezige = #{zhiyezige},
Peixun = #{peixun},
Gongzuojingyan = #{gongzuojingyan},
Gexingtezheng = #{gexingtezheng},
Jibenjineng = #{jibenjineng},
OrderId = #{orderid},
FullDepartmentCode = #{fulldepartmentcode},
isEF = #{isEF},
where StationCode=#{stationcode}
mapper.select: select MAX(CAST(StationCode as SIGNED INTEGER)) from station

select station.*,station.FullDepartmentCode,d.DepartmentName from station,department d
and station.DepartmentCode=#{departmentcode}
and station.StationName like concat('%',#{stationname},'%')
and d.DepartmentCode=station.DepartmentCode
order by station.StationCode+0
select s.DepartmentCode,s.StationCode, s.StationName,s.isEF,d.DepartmentName from station s,department d where s.DepartmentCode=d.DepartmentCode and d.DepartmentCode=#{departmentcode}

SELECT s.*, d.DepartmentName , ss.ScoreType, ss.Id scoreId FROM station s inner join department d on d.DepartmentCode=s.DepartmentCode left join scorestation ss on ss.ScorringStationCode = s.StationCode AND ss.ScorredStationCode = #{scorredStationCode} AND ss.ScoreType = #{scoreType} AND ss.DutyCode = #{dutyCode} AND ss.dbtype = #{dbtype} where s.StationCode != #{scorredStationCode} AND s.isEF = 1 ORDER BY s.StationCode +0;

select s.*,d.DepartmentName from station s inner join department d on d.DepartmentCode=s.DepartmentCode where s.StationCode in
#{item}
